Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence Consultancy

Your data is talking, are you listening?

One-size-fits-all type solutions don't work! We deliver customized solutions to get maximum accuracy and usability.

Chatbots

Semantic Search

Consulting

What do we do?

Natural Language Processing

We build software that will unlock meaning from your linguistic data - such as reviews, medical records, books etc.

Corpus Creation

Almost all NLP and ML processes start with good quality data. We can quickly bootstrap your existing data to build a corpus that you can train your models on.

Chatbots

Reduce the amount of time you spend on mundane tasks and automate your processes with a chatbot for a 24/7 uptime. Contact us today for our chatbot offerings.

Machine Learning

We use highly sophisticated machine learning algorithms for our supervised and unsupervised NLP tasks such as NER, POS tagging, classification, keyword extraction, topic modeling etc. .

Semantic Search

We have developed deep models to understand several linguistic phenomenon that you can use for deep searches. Super-charge your searches.

Tuning Models

We can help tune your Machine Learning models with the right hyper-parameters and data to boost your scores.

We bring your projects to life, all the way from idea and into production.
Want to work with us? Here is the process that we follow:

Discovery Call

We will have a quick discussion to talk about your high-level requirements and evaluate the best step forward.

Solution Proposal

We will develop a customized proposal for you, with recommended techniques and time and budget estimates.

Statement of Work

We will mutually sign a SOW that describes the work to be performed, milestones, and success criteria.

Software Delivery

The software code will be delivered to you at predefined checkpoints and also at the end of our engagement.

Stuck with a text analytics, natural language understanding or similar problem? We can help! Call us at +1-858-245-0602, or email us at contact@ticary.com. You can also use our contact us form.

About us


Ticary Solutions is a Natural Language Processing consultancy that provides full-stack software solutions. We have 25+ years of experience in Software Development, and 15+ years of experience working in Artificial Intelligence (particularly Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Machine Learning).

Ticary Solutions is run by Dr. Rutu Mulkar-Mehta, who has a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Southern California in Los Angeles, a Postdoc in Biomedical Informatics from University of California in San Diego, and is a part-time faculty member at Northeastern University in Seattle.

We love a challenge, and solving hard problems is our specialty. We enjoy the creative process of coming up with out of the box solutions, and the challenge of viewing problems differently.

We believe that each unique business deserves their own custom solutions in order to extract maximum value from their data. Standard off the shelf solutions can only take you part of the way there (learn why). Our custom solutions are designed to focus on your specific problems for maximum accuracy and productivity.


Technology Stack

Our NLP solutions are primarily written in Python or Java. We have worked extensively with tools like Scikit-Learn, Gensim, spaCy and others in Python and UIMA, Stanford Core NLP and others in Java

Deployment is primarily on Amazon AWS or Google Cloud. If you have a favorite backend service that you prefer to use (such a Pivotal), we are happy to accommodate.
